landing.title: Grow your business with Haady
landing.subtitle: The all-in-one platform to manage your stores, track sales, and scale your business effortlessly.
landing.joinThousands: Join thousands of businesses already using Haady to manage their operations.

features.title: Everything you need to run your business

multiStore.title: Multi-Store Management
multiStore.description: Manage multiple stores from a single dashboard. Add, edit, and organize all your locations effortlessly.

analytics.title: Sales Analytics
analytics.description: Track your performance with real-time analytics and insights to make data-driven decisions.

security.title: Secure & Reliable
security.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security. We keep your business information safe.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Built for speed. Access your dashboard and manage your business from anywhere, anytime.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Invite team members, assign roles, and collaborate seamlessly across your organization.

tools.title: Business Tools
tools.description: All the tools you need to run your business efficiently, from inventory to customer management.

auth.subtitle: Get paid the same day — no matter how your clients pays.
auth.enterEmail: Enter your email to receive a verification code and get started.
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.failedToSend: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
auth.codeExpired: This verification code has expired or is invalid. Please request a new code.
auth.signedIn: You have been signed in successfully.
